mapper.select: SELECT writer, SUBSTR(start_time, 1, 10) AS startTime, SUBSTR(end_time, 1, 10) AS endTime, rdate FROM stdy WHERE SUBSTR(start_time, 1, 10) = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND rdate = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND SUBSTR(end_time, 1, 10) = NULL

SELECT s.name AS writer, st.WRITER AS stdnId, st.start_time as startTime FROM stdy st JOIN stdn s ON s.id = st.writer WHERE SUBSTR(start_time, 1, 10) = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND rdate = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AND SUBSTR(end_time, 1, 10) = NULL ORDER BY s.name
